```{r}
cage.data <- full.data
y.axis = "VO2"
group.by = "Sex"
split.by = "Genotype"
plot.track <- function(cage.data, 
                       group.by = NULL,
                       split.by = NULL,
                       y.axis = NULL,
                       sample.subset = NULL) {
  
  
  if(!is.null(group.by) | !is.null(split.by)) {
    pre.plot.dat <- pull.dat(c(group.by, split.by), cage.data)
    num.vals <- length(c(group.by, split.by))
    which(is.null(c(group.by, split.by)))
    
    num.vals <- num.vals-1
    pre.plot.dat
    colnames(pre.plot.dat)[(ncol(pre.plot.dat)-num.vals):ncol(pre.plot.dat)] <- c()
        pre.plot.dat %>%
          group_by(Interval_num, group.by, split.by) %>%
          summarise(y.axis = mean(y.axis))
    colnames(pre.plot) <- c("x.axis","y.axis")
  } else {
    pre.plot.dat <- bind_rows(cage.data[[1]])
    colnames(pre.plot.dat)[which(colnames(pre.plot.dat) == y.axis)] <- "y.axis"
    pre.plot.dat <- pre.plot.dat %>%
      group_by(Interval_num) %>%
      summarise(y.axis = mean(y.axis))
    colnames(pre.plot) <- c("x.axis","y.axis")

  if(is.null(group.by)) {
    plot <- ggplot(pre.plot, aes(x=as.numeric(x.axis), y = y.axis)) + 
                  stat_smooth(
                      geom = 'area', method = 'gam', span = 1/3, fill = "grey") + 
      ylab(y.axis) + 
      xlab("Time Interval") + 
      theme_classic()
  } else {
      plot <- ggplot(pre.plot, aes(x=as.numeric(x.axis), y = y.axis)) + 
                  stat_smooth(
                      geom = 'area', method = 'gam', span = 1/3,
                      aes(fill = group)) + 
      ylab(y.axis) + 
      xlab("Time Interval") + 
      theme_classic()
  }
  if(!is.null(split.by)) {
    plot <- plot + facet_grid(.~split)
  }
  
  return(plot)
}
```
